attributes.action: clarify the definition of a pie, as to whether the definition should be usable to define a pastry topped fruit confectionary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, it is a common misnomer in many sources to allow the word 'pie' to describe a pastry cased (and topped) product regardless of whether the filling is sweet or savoury. It is felt by the proposer of this petition that only savoury filled products of this kind should be classified as a pie. Sweet filled products should only legally be describible as a 'tart'.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
